Description:
One more SOLD by SKAD before auction!! More properties Wanted !!
Location Perfect - 6 minutes walk to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre. Low
maintenance family home, massive 650 square metre allotment approx. Suit: first
home buyer, growing family, savvy investor. Consider S.T.C.A with approval. 'Larger
than average home for this location' Dreaming of space? Good size 3 bedrooms
(possible 4th), providing dining, family & entertainment areas. Pergola area, space
for future pool, playground or granny flat. Multiple off street parking options. Access
to shopping, Bus, Train, Freeway & excellent schools. Take your pick, make it yours
- inspect now!
Please do not hesitate to call Deepak 0477 589 549 or Dave 0430 327 172 for any further
information or book a private inspection.
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers -
http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
In the Heart of Craigieburn!!!
Universal Real Estate Vic proudly presents this perfectly positioned house in Craigieburn with a central location to all amenities. With quality design and amazing floor plan, this beautiful house is a complete turnkey package for you and your family.
SPECIFICATIONS:
- BEDROOMS: 3 Spacious Bedrooms (Master Bedroom with Walk-in Robe and Full Ensuite, other 2 Bedrooms have Built-in Robes and sliding mirror doors serviced by a central bathroom with a bathtub).
- KITCHEN: Spacious Open Plan Living/ Dining Kitchen with 900 mm Stainless Steel Appliances, stone benchtops, Mounted Sink, Electric Oven, Dishwasher, Walk-in Pantry and Ample cupboard space.
- LIVING AREA: Open Plan Living
- HEAT/COOL: Ducted Heating and Evaporative Cooling.
- LAUNDRY: Spacious Laundry.
- PARKING: Double Car Garage with remote control access.
- BACKYARD: Low Maintenance Concrete Backyard with Concrete around the house.
- ADDITIONAL INCLUSIONS: High Ceilings, Downlights, Block-out Blinds, Quality Flooring, Tiled shower and niches in both Bathrooms, High Doors, Carpet Cat 4 with underlay, Pot Drawers and much more...
- LOCATION: Walking Distance to Highlander Dr and Grand Blvd and Sustainable Park. Close proximity to Malcolm Creek Primary School, Newbury Primary School, Aitken Creek Primary School, Our Lady's Primary School, Newbury Child and Community Centre, Highland Shopping Centre, Supermarkets, Gym, Club Trillium, Hockey Ground and Golden Sun Moth Park. Easy access to bus stops, beautiful parklands, Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, Craigieburn Junction, Child Cares, Service Stations, Restaurants/CafÃ© and Hume Freeway.
If you're in the market for that perfect all-round property, then look no further than this.
Don't miss out! Call Achal Arora - 0432 413 929.

Description:
Feature-Packed Family Lifestyle of Quality and Class
Ideally situated in an established Highlands neighbourhood, this contemporary home provides an exceptional family environment with its free-flowing design, long list of inclusions & terrific living/entertaining spaces both inside & out.
Beyond its distinctive double facade, the home's spacious single-level floorplan boasts 3 bedrooms (large master with walk-in robe & private ensuite), dedicated study/home office area, main family bathroom & separate WC.
Dual living zones include a central lounge leading through to the light-filled open family/dining area accompanied by a stylish stone-bench kitchen complete with tiled splashbacks, Technika cooking appliances & dishwasher. Other stand-out features include ducted heating and split-system air-conditioning, comprehensive security system (alarm, video intercom & CCTV), integrated speakers & high ceilings throughout.
Step outside to discover an undercover patio/entertaining area and sunny yard with extensive decking, plus rear access into the oversized single garage (remote-controlled). Moments from the open spaces of Malcolm Creek parkland and endless walking/cycling trails, it's also close to Aitken Boulevard buses, Mount Ridley College, Highlands and Craigieburn Central shopping centres.

Description:
Never Ending Potential
Ready to move in or even develop, this home is situated in a sought after location close to all amenities. With land approximately 650m2 there is an abundance of potential for development (S.T.C.A) given Craigieburns growing popularity. If development or renovation isnt your thing this home is ready to move in and enjoy all year round.
Comprising of three bedrooms all with built in robes accompanied by a fourth bedroom/ study. Not only does the home come with a separate lounge room and dining room, it also offers a spacious kitchen with ample cupboard and bench space with a separate meals area. The recently updated main bathroom and additional shower and toilet is a true delight.
Other key features include gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, air conditioning, pergola and outdoor spa, lock up garage and lock up carport ideal for boat, caravan or four-wheel drive.

Description:
First Home Buyer and Investors Perfect Start
This beautifully presented family home in the highly sought after location will be sure to impress!
Great for the first home buyer, downsizers and investors. Comprising of 3 bedrooms all with BIR, master with full ensuite and WIR. Quality kitchen with glass splashback, Ceaser Stone bench, stainless steel appliances and ample cupboard space. Open plan meals and family area, well maintained low maintenance backyard with storage shed and much more.
Additional features include the comforts of ducted heating, split system cooling, and double lock up garage with internal access. Close to Hume Anglican Grammar School. Walking distance to Newbury Primary School and Pelican Childcare, this home is very centrally located. Inspection will not disappoint!
Call us today!

Description:
Ultimate Class and Exceptional Ex Display Home in Aston !!!
Experience the absolute best in family living with this impressive ex display residence. This marvellous modern retreat has an abundance of living zones and fantastic outdoor entertaining, which is matched by a wonderful location. Standing bold and proud this stunning family home is impressive at every angle and just waiting for the lucky new buyer to continue its traditions.
The hub of the home centres around an equally striking and sprawling state of the art kitchen with premium stone bench-tops, breakfast bar, quality appliances including double ovens & large butler's pantry with cooktop, rangehood, convection oven, inbuilt microwave, large wine cellar is bonus. Adjoining meal and family zone opening out to an amazing entertainer's deck, luring natural light whilst creating a fantastic indoor/outdoor interplay. there is no shortage of room to retreat for all of the family. 2 additional bedrooms with walk-in robes and one with built in robes, main family bathroom & powder room. Multiple living zones including a front separate lounge, upstairs family retreat, theatre room plus an expansive open-plan living/dining area with timber stacker doors revealing a fabulous al-fresco entertaining area.
Bathed in natural light, the home's interior showcases stunning master bedroom with walk in robes, deluxe double vanity ensuite with double shower and free-standing bath. Other highlights include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, large laundry & an abundance of storage throughout the home, fans in all rooms, alarm, bifold doors to all living areas, plus an expansive yet private backyard with landscaped gardens as well as remote-control double garage with internal entry, & so much more.
Conveniently located within walking distance to public transport, child care facilities, Champion Parade park, Soccer fields, Craigieburn South Secondary School will open its doors in Term 1 2020, Aitken Hill Primary School which is now open and just a short walk from Aston. Aston is located in Craigieburn, just 32 kilometres north of the Melbourne CBD and is only 16 kilometres from Melbourne Airport. Easy commute to Melbourne's CBD via the Hume Highway and Tullamarine Freeway These are just more features that will make your future brighter at Aston.
Be quick to contact Gordon on 0433 897 397 to secure this fantastic opportunity!

Description:
FAMILY FAVORITE IN A PRIME LOCATION
Opportunity Awaits
Conveniently positioned within walking distance to Newbury Primary, Mount Ridley secondary school, Public transport, Local Shops, Sports Grounds, Highlands Shopping centre and much more. Well equipped with all the bells and whistles to impress first home buyers or even the savviest of investors. Located only a short drive away from Craigieburn central, splash aqua park, Hume Library and everything else Craigieburn has to offer.
Features included:
· 3 Bedrooms with built in robes
· Master with Walk in robe and Private Ensuite
· Lockup Garage
· Open plan Living and Meals area
· Kitchen with Stainless Steel appliances INC Dishwasher
· Main Bathroom with separate toilet
· Ducted Heating and Cooling
· Eco friendly Solar system
· Surrounded by landscaped gardens
· Colourbond fencing all around
· Approximate Rental $1820 per month.
· Floor Boards
. 16 Solar Panels ( 4KW )

Description:
33sqr Home on 512m2
AUCTION THIS SATURDAY!!!!
Set in a convenient location, you will enjoy the lifestyle amenities that this neighbourhood has to offer. Within close proximity to community centres, childcare facilities and schools, parks and recreational reserves, the family friendly entertainment complex Highlands Hotel, major shopping centres including Craigieburn North and Craigieburn Central. Also within easy access to the train station and major roads.
The perfect home to enjoy so many lifestyle amenities at your door step or for young and growing families to live in a community with an abundant of essential services. Inspections will definitely impress the astute buyer.
This 4 bedroom plus study/5th bedroom family home presents an exciting lifestyle with its versatile floorplan, quality features throughout & prime location close to all of Craigieburn's desirable amenities.
Greeted by an expansive entrance hallway, the home's free-flowing interior boasts a large master bedroom with ensuite & walk-in-robe and spa, additional bedrooms all with built-in-robes, separate designated study & well appointed stylish main bathroom. Multiple living zones include a separate formal lounge, spacious open-plan living & dining area enhanced by a gourmet stone-bench kitchen with stainless steel appliances & ample cupboard space.
Step outside from the sliding stacker doors and entertain with an over sized backyard and al-fresco area providing great space for kids to play. Other features include heating, cooling, Westinghouse dishwasher, 900mm stove and oven, security cameras plus the added advantage of a remote control double garage with internal access.
Insights: 42 Canisby Way, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 51 other 5 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Instantly Appealing in a Prized Location
Be quick to inspect this beautifully presented home offering gorgeous street appeal and quality interior features with an abundance of natural light & character to all home buyers and investors alike. Offering 3 bedrooms, master with his & hers walk in robe, ensuite with large shower, fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher & ample cupboard space, striking main bathroom, study or home office, large open plan meals area with adjoining family room. Step outside and you will find an entertainer's delight, complete with under cover alfresco & surrounded by low maintenance landscaped gardens. A host of extras include high ceilings, ducted heating, split system heating & cooling, beautifully maintained carefree gardens, single garage with remote control entry & large laundry with plenty of cupboard space. All this offering a blend of low maintenance living, without compromising space or comfort. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & parkland. Description:
Uncompromised Quality and Versatility on Approx 744sqm!
Absolute family perfection, this amazing 4BR home is set on a huge block of land delivering a ready-to-enjoy lifestyle with its flexible floorplan, premium inclusions and immaculate garden surrounds - all just moments from Malcolm Creek trails and acres of parkland.
Designed and built for ultimate family enjoyment, the home's impressive interior comprises a large master bedroom with WIR and private ensuite, 3 additional bedrooms (all with BIRs), main central bathroom and separate WC.
Spacious and versatile, the home's three distinct living zones include a front lounge (or home office), expansive open-plan family/dining area and light-filled rumpus/living room, plus the added appeal of a superb stone-bench kitchen complete with stainless steel appliances and walk-in pantry.
Other stand-out features include ducted heating and split-system a/c, ceiling fans (all bedrooms), solar power, laundry and linen storeroom, plus a large undercover entertaining area, wonderfully wide backyard garden, sideway storage shed and internally-accessed double garage (r/c) with drive-through option.
Easy access to the very best of Craigieburn including popular schools (zoned to Willmott Park PS), kinder/childcare services, public transport, aquatic centre and Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre.
What a home!

Set in a prime position within all amenities Craigieburn has to offer is this great opportunity to enter the market. Ideally located within a stone's throw away from Medical centre, Craigieburn Oval ground, Stockland Highlands Shopping Centre, Moth Park, Highlands Hotel and public transport at your doorstep. Surrounded by the Craigieburn's best schools, including Craigieburn Primary, Aitken Creek Primary, Mt Ridley College and Hume Anglican Grammar. Currently leased until November 2019, this is the perfect first home or addition to your investment portfolio. Inspect now before it's too late!
Features included
· 2 Bedrooms with built in robes
· Lockup automatic garage
· Open plan Living and Meals area
· Kitchen with Stainless Steel appliances and Dishwasher
· Spacious main bathroom
· Split system Cooling and Heating
· Alfresco area perfect for year-round gatherings
· Surrounded by landscaped gardens
· Colourbond fencing all around
. Floor Boards throughout living areas

Description:
What A Treasure
If you are looking for that perfect first home, downsizing or keen on adding to your investment
portfolio then this is the way to go.
Full of charm and character this cozy well maintained home offers a great start in this ever so
popular leafy highlands estate.
Upon further inspection of this gorgeous home you will be delighted to find:
• Study or potential 3rd Bedroom
• 2 spacious Bedrooms BIR
• Master with very large WIR and Ensuite
• Central bathroom servicing the second bedroom
• Ducted heating
• Split system air conditioning
• Alarm system
• Lock up garage
• Corner block
• Open plan living/meals area
• Central kitchen with ample cupboard space
• 2.7 Meter high ceilings throughout
• Wide entrance hallway
Located within walking distance to Craigieburn Primary school an inspection is highly recommended!

Description:
A Brand New Style of Living
Simply turn the key and move straight into this sparkling brand new Porter Davis built family home, with the peace of mind knowing everything has been done for you. With its instant street appeal, this beautifully designed and spacious home will excite your senses with 4 bedrooms, ensuite with DB vanities & WIR to main, fully equipped kitchen with a large walk in pantry, overlooks a spacious open plan living with family and dining room, plus the added bonus of a separate living room, DB remote garage with internal access and professionally landscaped gardens front and rear on a generous sized 383m2 allotment.
Featuring full turn-key inclusions and premium upgrades, including: Roller blinds throughout, 900mm stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and stone bench tops, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, LED down lights to entry and living areas, alarm, letterbox, clothesline, fencing and much more.
This amazing package is well located close to Highlands Shopping Centre, Highlands Hotel, local shops and suitable for families with primary school, Newbury Child and Community Centre and beautiful parks with walking tracks all close by. Don't miss out on this sensational offering, call today!

Calling a First Home buyer or an Investor
A fantastic opportunity to purchase this 2 bedroom, Double Storey, townhouse.
First Floor offers an Open plan Living concept, designed to keep the family together.
Kitchen with Stainless Steel Appliances, Luxurious Stone Bench top complete the seamless impressive layout.
Downstairs Two Bedrooms with Central Bathroom
Single lock up garage, with private courtyard, extending your living needs.
Impressively located close to shops, schools, and transport
Other Inclusions:
Split Systems, cooling and Heating, to bedrooms and Living room
20 mm Stone Benchtops, to Kitchen and Bathrooms
Tiled Splashback to Kitchen
600 mm Stainless Steel Appliances
Fencing
Landscape garden
TV points
